attributes.action: Continue with Article 50 and leave the EU
attributes.additional_details:
No we don’t know how things will turn out, but if we never tried anything new then there would be no progress.
We are in exciting times and there are many possibilities now open to us.
attributes.background:
As there is so much hot air about the petition to halt Article 50, it’s only fair that the people who want to continue and leave the EU are able to express their wishes too. 
Leavers aren’t stupid. Leavers aren’t racist. It’s THEIR democratic right to expect a leave vote to be honoured.
